title: Teaching Assistant
desc: Supporting the teacher in planning and preparing lessons, including creating materials and resources for activities and assessments.Assisting with classroom management, such as monitoring student behavior and helping to maintain a positive learning environment.Providing individual or small-group instruction to students who need additional support or enrichment.Grading assignments and providing feedback to students on their work.Communicating with parents or guardians about student progress and any concerns or issues that may arise
